A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It's definitely flawed but it's still an overall good movie. The action is breathtaking\, the effects are great\, the film has a great sense of humor. The acting is good\, there are some twists I didn't see coming and we get a deeper look into Kylo Ren's past. I didn't like how they handled Snoke and parts of the movie blatantly rip off Return of the Jedi and The Empire Strikes Back but I definitely enjoyed the film.
